# Homogeneous Poisson Process

## Class

```{r}
pois_y <- hpp(lambda = 1)

pois_y
```


## Simulate

```{r}
events <- simulatehpp(lambda = 1, end = 10)
events

```


## Fit

```{r}

hppmle(events)

```




## Plot

```{r}
plothpp_step(events)
```
```{r}
drawHPPIntensity(pois_y,color = "red")
```

# Hawkes Process

## Fit


```{r}
sample_events <- readRDS("time.RDS")
initial <- c(0.5,0.5,0.5)
fit_values <- fithp(vec = initial,t = sample_events, termination = max(sample_events))

fit_values

```


## Plot

```{r}
drawHPIntensity(object = fit_values, hawkes_time =  sample_events)
```
